attributes.additional_details:
Despite the Planning Inspectorate,after a lengthy Inquiry, giving Approval to the plans, by ONLY listening to non- resident objectors, headed by SAVE, instead of LISTENING to &  taking into account the needs and wishes of the Local Community, Minister Eric Pickles took it upon himself to refuse permission for the plans to be implemented.This is after waiting for 11 years for improvement of the area,further condemning the Community to live with the eyesore of rapidly deteriorating properties and the unhealthy environment of Rat infestations & other Health hazards.
Would the Government kindly reverse Mr Pickle's decision & allow the plans to go ahead, to give people in this Community Decent Homes, which they voted for,after entensive consultations with residents.?
